title: karuNa jUDavayya
sahitya:
karuNa jUDavayya mAyayya kAvETi rangayya



anupallavi



parama puruSa vinu mApAli pennidhAnamA varada nalugurilO vara mosagi karamidi



caraNam



cAradEsi kanulacE jElangu bhaya naccarula tOnu mari sadbhaktulatO AlavArulatO

    nIvu vara naivEdyamula nAragincu vELala hari tyAgarAjuni karamiDi
